n,k,m = map(int,input().split())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))

s = sum(a)

if m*n - s > k: 
    print(-1)
else:
    print(m*n - s)
# coding: utf-8

n,k,m = map(int,input().split())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))

s = sum(a)

if m*n - s > k: # m*n - s の最大値はk
    print(-1)
else:
    print(m*n - s)
n, k, m = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

sum_a = sum(a)

if n*m > sum_a:
    print(n*m - sum_a)
elif n*m == sum_a:
    print(0)
else:
    print(-1)

n,k,m = map(int,input().split())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))

s = sum(a)

if m*n - s > k: 
    print(-1)
else:
    print(m*n - s)
n,k,m = map(int,input().split())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))

score = sum(a)

if score + k < m*n:
    print(-1)
else:
    print(max(0,m*n-score))

    print(-1)

    print(m*n - s)
